PERSONA.NAME: Saturninus
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: Roman emperor, marries Tamora, later murdered by Lucius.

PERSONA.NAME: Bassianus
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: Saturninus' brother, marries Lavinia. Killed by Tamora's sons.

PERSONA.NAME: Marcus Andronicus
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: Titus' younger brother, uncle to Lavinia.

PERSONA.NAME: Lucius
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: Titus' oldest son, later becomes emperor.

PERSONA.NAME: Alarbus
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: Oldest son to Tamora, killed by Titus' sons.

PERSONA.NAME: Demetrius
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: Son to Tamora, killed by Titus.

PERSONA.NAME: Chiron
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: Son to Tamora, killed by Titus.

PERSONA.NAME: Aaron
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: The Moor, Tamora's evil lover. Later sentenced to death by Lucius.

PERSONA.NAME: Messenger
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: Delivers body parts from the Emperor.

PERSONA.NAME: Tamora
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: Queen of Goths, marries Saturninus but keep Aaron as her lover.

PERSONA.NAME: Lavinia
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: Titus' daughter, later killed by Titus to put her out of her misery.

PERSONA.NAME: Nurse
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: Delivers the child of Tamora and Aaron, afterwards killed by Aaron.

PERSONA.NAME: A black Child
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: The child of Tamora and Aaron.
